title: 9.4 Patch Delay
body:
Heads up that Patch 9.4 has been pushed one day and is planned to release on Thursday (2/21)!

Make sure those firewall settings are given League exceptions for a smooth patch: https://riot.com/2LzitDj

> [Here's our planned list of 9.4 changes, though as usual, not all of them will necessarily ship. Crit changes seem to have landed pretty well (so far), and we're continuing to monitor folks like Akali/Aatrox for potential follow-up on 9.5 or beyond once we've seen competitive play 
> -@RiotMapleNectar](https://twitter.com/RiotMapleNectar/status/1095460202067898368)
